title: Home Energy Rebate Tool
description: Actively contributing to the development and maintenance of the Home Energy Rebate Web Application for the [U.S. Department of Energy](https://www.energy.gov/). Enables States to report Electrification and Homes rebate reservation to provide uniform reporting for DOE.

title: Home Energy Score, DOE
description: Actively contributing to the development and maintenance of the Home Energy Score Web Application for the [U.S. Department of Energy](https://www.energy.gov/). It integrates with [NRELâ€™s OpenStudio](https://openstudio.net/) software to perform building energy simulations and generate standardized energy efficiency scores for residential buildings.

title: GPST Open Tools Submission Portal
description: Developed a web form for researchers and contributors to submit open-source research tools to the Global Power System Transformation, [GPST](https://globalpst.org/) Consortium, supporting global collaboration in power system innovation and analysis.

title: Fast Tracking Roof Top Solar Application Processing
description: Developed an end to end automated software solution to process rooftop solar applications. Built with Python, Vue, MSSQL, OpenDSS. Fetches customer's application from PowerClerk, performs scenario based 8760 powerflow analysis to perfrom accept/reject decision.

title: North American Energy Resilience Model (NAERM)
description: Developed, maintained and contributed 10s of microservices using FastAPI and Docker  to built a platform that enables large co-simulation to answer what/if questions for [U.S. Department of Energy](https://www.energy.gov/).
